plot: Abby's mourning is cut short by shock, but friends prevent her from being lured away by revenge. Madison tells Shea about her new friend; Abby tells Henry and Danny that she is not Wakefield's child. Shane makes a stand during another attack on Cannery Row. Sully and Cal discover a new comradeship; while Abby, Henry, and Danny return to a gruesome scene at the bar. Friends rendezvous at the chapel, where Chloe is kidnapped; they make a plan to flush out the killer in the Candlewick tunnels. Cal risks everything to save the love of his life; Shea finds a terrifying file about a possible Wakefield accomplice - a file which includes a mugshot of one of their friends.—Anonymous

Having allowed the sheriff to explain to Abby before his execution, John Wakefield openly continues hunting down the others, only Jimmy is safely delivered and nursed successfully, only now Madison admits he was her 'new friend' from the start. Shane is slashed to death in a duel, allowing most girls to escape and find the tunnel plans in the secret study. Wakefield sneakily captured Chloe, mainly as bait, irresistible for Cal, who returned with Sully as the sailing yacht is gone, leaving them stranded now a storm knocked out all communication. The papers suggest Wakefield, who kills Cal, may have a surprising accomplice.—KGF Vissers
